text: Aleksandra Aćimović Popović (Cyrillic:Александра Аћимовић Поповић); known as Sasha Montenegro (20 January 1946 in Bari-15 February 2024) was an Italian born-Mexican actress and vedette of Yugoslavian descent. Category:1946 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Mexican movie actors
title: Sasha Montenegro
